channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel -- RAID Web Console 3 (RWC3)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel -- RAID Web Console 3 (RWC3)

item.title: CVE-2023-4339|2023-09-16T02:04:25.818Z -- intel -- raid%20web%20console%203%20%28rwc3%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable to exposure of private keys used for CIM stored with insecure file permissions

item.title: CVE-2023-4342|2023-09-16T02:04:26.404Z -- intel -- raid%20web%20console%203%20%28rwc3%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to insecure defaults of lacking HTTP strict-transport-security policy

item.title: CVE-2023-4335|2023-09-16T02:04:25.101Z -- intel -- raid%20web%20console%203%20%28rwc3%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller Web server (nginx) is serving private server-side files without any authentication on Linux

item.title: CVE-2023-4323|2023-09-16T02:04:23.092Z -- intel -- raid%20web%20console%203%20%28rwc3%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable to improper session management of active sessions on Gateway setup

item.title: CVE-2023-4334|2023-09-16T02:04:24.923Z -- intel -- raid%20web%20console%203%20%28rwc3%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller Web server (nginx) is serving private files without any authentication

item.title: CVE-2023-4343|2023-09-16T02:04:26.622Z -- intel -- raid%20web%20console%203%20%28rwc3%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to exposure of sensitive password information in the URL as a URL search parameter

item.title: CVE-2023-4338|2023-09-16T02:04:25.625Z -- intel -- raid%20web%20console%203%20%28rwc3%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to insecure default of HTTP configuration that does not provide X-Content-Type-Options Headers

item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface doesnâ€™t enforce SSL cipher ordering by server

item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to usage of Libcurl with LSA has known vulnerabilities

item.title: CVE-2023-4329|2023-09-16T02:04:24.200Z -- intel -- raid%20web%20console%203%20%28rwc3%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to insecure default of HTTP configuration that does not safeguard SESSIONID cookie with SameSite attribute

item.title: CVE-2023-4344|2023-09-16T02:04:26.779Z -- intel -- raid%20web%20console%203%20%28rwc3%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable to insufficient randomness due to improper use of ssl.rnd to setup CIM connection

item.title: CVE-2023-4345|2023-09-16T02:04:27.021Z -- intel -- raid%20web%20console%203%20%28rwc3%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable client-side control bypass leads to unauthorized data access for low privileged user

item.title: CVE-2023-4328|2023-09-16T02:04:23.952Z -- intel -- raid%20web%20console%203%20%28rwc3%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable to exposure of sensitive data and the keys used for encryption are accessible to any local user on Windows

item.title: CVE-2023-4324|2023-09-16T02:04:23.250Z -- intel -- raid%20web%20console%203%20%28rwc3%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to insecure defaults of lacking HTTP Content-Security-Policy headers

item.title: CVE-2023-4332|2023-09-16T02:04:24.551Z -- intel -- raid%20web%20console%203%20%28rwc3%29
item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to Improper permissions on the log file

item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable to exposure of sensitive data and the keys used for encryption are accessible to any local user on Linux

item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable has an insecure default TLS configuration that support obsolete and vulnerable TLS protocols

item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable has an insecure default TLS configuration that supports obsolete SHA1-based ciphersuites

item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller is vulnerable to Privilege escalation by taking advantage of the Session prints in the log file

item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable to improper session handling of managed servers on Gateway installation

item.description: Broadcom RAID Controller web interface is vulnerable due to insecure default of HTTP configuration that does not safeguard cookies with Secure attribute
